name: kovaja-ts-node-template
description: Empty project with template for node.js application with REST api and react frontend

scripts.postinstall: npm run client:install && npm run server:install
scripts.client:install: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.server:install: cd server && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.publish: git push origin master && git push heroku +master && heroku logs --tail -a <your-app-name>
scripts.publish:patch: npm run validate && npm version patch && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run validate && npm version minor && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run validate && npm version major && npm run publish

author: kovaja
